This module implements binary fields with AVX2.

Imports

../../../intrinsic, ../../../../core/fieldtype

Types

BinaryField = M256i
(PAD, color1:col0-col5, PAD, PAD, color2:col0-col5, PAD) 
DropMask = array[6 * 2, when UseBmi2: ## Mask used in `drop`.
  uint16
else:
  PextMask[uint16]]
Mask used in drop. 
WhichColor = object
  color1*: range[0'i64 .. 1'i64]
  color2*: range[0'i64 .. 1'i64]
Indicates the color.

Returns the binary field with row==WaterRow.low bits one. 
func waterInsert(self: var BinaryField; row: Row; col: Column; which: WhichColor) {.
    inline, ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Inserts which and shifts the field and shifts the field. If (row, col) is in the air, shifts the field upward above the location where inserted. If it is in the water, shifts the fields downward below the location where inserted. 
func waterRemoveSqueeze(self: var BinaryField; row: Row; col: Column) {.inline,
    ...raises: [], tags: [], forbids: [].}
Removes the value at (row, col) and shifts the field. If (row, col) is in the air, shifts the field downward above the location where removed. If it is in the water, shifts the fields upward below the location where removed.
